Get ESPN men's college basketball team box scores

Source: R/espn_mbb_data.R
espn_mbb_team_box.Rd

Get ESPN men's college basketball team box scores

espn_mbb_team_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

A team boxscore data frame

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_mbb_team_box(game_id = 401256760))
#>     game_id season season_type  game_date team_short_display_name
#> 1 401256760   2021           2 2020-12-12                 Florida
#> 2 401256760   2021           2 2020-12-12           Florida State
#>         team_uid team_alternate_color team_color       team_display_name
#> 1 s:40~l:41~t:57               0021a5     0021A5          Florida Gators
#> 2 s:40~l:41~t:52               ceb888     782F40 Florida State Seminoles
#>   team_name                                         team_logo team_location
#> 1    Gators https://a.espncdn.com/i/teamlogos/ncaa/500/57.png       Florida
#> 2 Seminoles https://a.espncdn.com/i/teamlogos/ncaa/500/52.png Florida State
#>   team_id team_abbreviation               team_slug
#> 1      57               FLA          florida-gators
#> 2      52               FSU florida-state-seminoles
#>   field_goals_made_field_goals_attempted field_goal_pct
#> 1                                  25-59           42.4
#> 2                                  26-54           48.1
#>   three_point_field_goals_made_three_point_field_goals_attempted
#> 1                                                          10-23
#> 2                                                           8-16
#>   three_point_field_goal_pct free_throws_made_free_throws_attempted
#> 1                       43.5                                  11-16
#> 2                       50.0                                  23-30
#>   free_throw_pct total_rebounds offensive_rebounds defensive_rebounds
#> 1           68.8             34                 10                 24
#> 2           76.7             33                  8                 25
#>   team_rebounds assists steals blocks turnovers team_turnovers total_turnovers
#> 1             0      14      6      8        20              0              20
#> 2             0      17      8      4        16              0              16
#>   technical_fouls total_technical_fouls flagrant_fouls fouls largest_lead
#> 1               0                     0              0    24            9
#> 2               0                     0              0    18           18
#>   home_away opponent_id opponent_name opponent_mascot opponent_abbrev
#> 1      HOME          52 Florida State       Seminoles             FSU
#> 2      AWAY          57       Florida          Gators             FLA
# }
